title.narrative: Somalia - Water for Agro-pastoral Productivity and Resilience

description.narrative: Develop water and agricultural services among agro-pastoralist communities in dryland areas of Somalia.

condition.narrative: The Recipient shall not later than two (2) months after the Effective Date, establish, and thereafter maintain, throughout theimplementation of the Project, an inter-ministerial steering committee (Steering Committee) at the federal level with functions,composition and resources satisfactory to the Association.
